Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back INCLUDES 1 FREE NIGHT View gallery / Back Le Bora Bora Aerial View Le Bora Bora Sunrise Le Bora Bora Pool Le Bora Bora Outrigger Le Bora Bora Aerial View Le Bora Bora Romantic Dinner Tahiti Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts &vert; Return flights • 8 Nights • Transfers Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Recently becoming a member of Relais & Châteaux, this newly renovated hotel, with refined touches combines modernity, comfort and authenticity. Natural materials like wood, bamboo, stone, and ropes are featured by high-quality traditional architecture. Its symbol is the circular flame of the dance, the beating heart of a peerless culture in the South Seas. It is the right place to discover the passion that inhabits the country. Built on the large natural sand bank of the Motu Tevairoa, a perfect location with no immediate neighbour, it shows off its "postcard" beach throughout the year. Crystal clear water, fine sand and shallow water over several meters make swimming a pleasure for young and old alike. Over crystal water bungalows, intimate suites with private garden & pool, beach suites with pool or the superb Royal Beach Villa: choice is yours! Hidden from view, visitors on the motu can enjoy many activities in or on the water, at the spa for a sauna or a massage, on our sports courts or at the fitness centre. In terms of Food and beverages, a delightful buffet breakfast, French, Polynesian, international and gourmet cuisine spread out over several dining options. Located 10 minutes by boat from airport and 15 minutes from Vaitape. View more View less 8 nights + flights, transfers & more from $ 7299* per person share twin Flying with Air New Zealand INCLUDES 1 FREE NIGHT Enquire now Sale Period : until 21 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal includes: Return Economy class (The Works) airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland to Papeete Add $160 per person return to fly from your nearest Air New Zealand serviced domestic airport Return Economy class flying Air Tahiti from Papeete to Bora Bora 5 nights at Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts 3 nights at Le Tahiti by Pearl Resorts (1 pre/2 post) Return Papeete & Bora Bora airport transfers Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts Inclusions: American buffet breakfast daily Includes 1 FREE night FREE Wi-Fi FREE use of stand up paddle boards & kayaks Add On 3 course dinner daily at Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts from $815 per person for 5 nights (dinner at Otemanu or Miki Miki restaurant, beverages not included) Treat yourself and upgrade your flights! Upgrade to Premium Economy from $560 per person return from Auckland Upgrade to Business Premier from $1900 per person return from Auckland Based on travel: 17 Apr-29 Jun & 26 Jul-24 Aug 26 Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Garden Villa with Pool Nestled in the resort's lush tropical garden, the Garden Villa with Pool offers the utmost privacy. Designed as a traditional Polynesian 'faré' (home) and surrounded by its own private garden, each villa includes a spacious bedroom, an en-suite bathroom with an indoor shower, a large sundeck with a plunge pool, and a gazebo for ultimate relaxation. Auckland 8 night package from $7299* per person share twin Additional night from $825 per person share twin Travel 13 Feb - 27 Mar 26 Auckland 8 night package from $9919* per person share twin Additional night from $1345 per person share twin Travel 04 May - 29 Jun 26 Auckland 8 night package from $10019* per person share twin Additional night from $1345 per person share twin Travel 17 Jul - 14 Aug 26, 17 Aug - 18 Sep 26 Wellington 8 night package from $7459* per person share twin Additional night from $825 per person share twin Travel 13 Feb - 27 Mar 26 Wellington 8 night package from $10079* per person share twin Additional night from $1345 per person share twin Travel 04 May - 29 Jun 26 Wellington 8 night package from $10179* per person share twin Additional night from $1345 per person share twin Travel 17 Jul - 14 Aug 26, 17 Aug - 18 Sep 26 Christchurch 8 night package from $7459* per person share twin Additional night from $825 per person share twin Travel 13 Feb - 27 Mar 26 Christchurch 8 night package from $10079* per person share twin Additional night from $1345 per person share twin Travel 04 May - 29 Jun 26 Christchurch 8 night package from $10179* per person share twin Additional night from $1345 per person share twin Travel 17 Jul - 14 Aug 26, 17 Aug - 18 Sep 26 Lagoon Overwater Bungalow This room category boasts an unobstructed view of the lagoon. Spanning 851 sq ft, it features a spacious bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, including a bathtub and separate shower. The furnished sundeck, complete with a gazebo, offers direct lagoon access. Large glass panels at the end of the bed and by the bathtub enhance the connection to the stunning surroundings. Auckland 8 night package from $8919* per person share twin Additional night from $1159 per person share twin Travel 13 Feb - 27 Mar 26 Auckland 8 night package from $11529* per person share twin Additional night from $1665 per person share twin Travel 04 May - 29 Jun 26 Auckland 8 night package from $11629* per person share twin Additional night from $1665 per person share twin Travel 17 Jul - 18 Sep 26 Wellington 8 night package from $9079* per person share twin Additional night from $1159 per person share twin Travel 13 Feb - 27 Mar 26 Wellington 8 night package from $11689* per person share twin Additional night from $1665 per person share twin Travel 04 May - 29 Jun 26 Wellington 8 night package from $11789* per person share twin Additional night from $1665 per person share twin Travel 17 Jul - 18 Sep 26 Christchurch 8 night package from $9079* per person share twin Additional night from $1159 per person share twin Travel 13 Feb - 27 Mar 26 Christchurch 8 night package from $11689* per person share twin Additional night from $1665 per person share twin Travel 04 May - 29 Jun 26 Christchurch 8 night package from $11789* per person share twin Additional night from $1665 per person share twin Travel 17 Jul - 18 Sep 26 Le Bora Bora by Pearl Resorts: Excludes Local City Tax XPF200 pp per night - payable direct. Le Tahiti by Pearl Resorts: Excludes local tax XPF150 per person, per night, and resort fee of XPF1950 per room, per night payable direct If the advertised room type doesn't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Bora Bora sightseeing optional add-ons Ultimate Shark & Ray Watching Full Day Tour Including Motu Lunch Embark on a motorized outrigger boat to meet the colourful fish, stingrays and black tip sharks that swim in the waters of Bora Bora. Enjoy the ukulele sound’s while cruising the lagoon while your Polynesian guide will lead you to the motu where a tasty lunch of grills and typical Tahitian dishes is prepared for you. Sit on one of the common large tables and enjoy a local entertainment while sipping a cool drink. Pricing based on hotel pick up and drop off from select Bora Bora accommodation. Operates: Daily Price from $345 per adult, $175 per child (4-12 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Jet Ski 2 Hour Guided Tour Go on a fun filled adventure around the Bora Bora lagoon on your own jet ski with your guide out in front. This is the perfect opportunity to take in all the lagoon’s blue hues and snap some incredible photos of the island and lagoon (waterproof compartment for cameras on the jet ski). Pricing does not include hotel pick up and drop off, please ask us for more information. Operates: Daily Price from $475 per Jet Ski Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Minimum age 16 years to drive a Jet Ski Mountain 4WD Safari - Natura Discovery Half Day Tour Get in a 4WD vehicle to discover the wild interior of Bora Bora, its WW2 remains not forgetting the spectacular panoramic views over the lagoon’s blue shadings. This tour is mainly focused on culture, including among others the visit of unknown archaeological sites located on private family lands. You will also make a stop at “mama Ruta’s” for a pareo traditional dyeing demonstration and sampling of local fruits. Pricing does not include hotel pick up and drop off, please ask us for more information Operates: Daily Price from $159 per adult, $79 per child (2-11 years) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Walk in the Valley of the Kings - Half Day Tour Discover through this ethnobotanical walk other treasures of Bora Bora, it’s mountains and rich nature. Your guide will explain how Polynesians use plants in their traditional medicine, before leading you at the foot of Mounts Otemanu and Pahi, where lies a giant banyan among other trees. These beautiful landscapes are not to be missed! Pricing does not include hotel pick up and drop off, please ask us for more information Operates: Daily Price from $125 per person Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Minimum age 5 years Terms & Conditions Sales to 21 Nov 25 or until sold out. Prices correct as at 05 Nov 25. • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases and availability. • Packages are applicable for new bookings only. Package prices are based on return Economy Class The Works flying Air New Zealand to Papeete from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch. • Flights from Wellington or Christchurch are via Auckland in both directions. • Premier Economy & Business Premier upgrades only on the AKL-PPT-AKL sector for travel between 17 Apr-29 Jun & 26 Jul-24 Aug 26 • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense. • Day of week surcharges may apply. Airfares are based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax & surcharge increases. • LE TAHITI BY PEARL RESORTS: Excludes local tax XPF150 per person, per night, and resort fee of XPF1950 per room, per night payable direct. LE BORA BORA BY PEARL RESORTS: Excludes Local City Tax XPF200 pp per night - payable direct. • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified. • Bedding configurations may vary. • Any resort credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & cannot be exchanged for cash. • Food and Beverage credits much be used onsite at their Restaurant and Bar. • Min/max stays apply. • Child costs where advertised are based on up to 2 children 11 years and under sharing accommodation with 2 adults using existing bedding. • Where Kids eat free this is based on 1 child per paying adult up to 2 kids 2-11yrs. • Full payment is required at time of booking. • Availability during holiday & peak travel periods may be limited. • Amendment and cancellation fees apply. • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. Advertised prices are per person (twin share) based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply. * FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. For finance terms and conditions visit hot.co.nz/payment-options. Sightseeing conditions: Prices are valid as at 28 May 25, but may vary depending on exchange rates. The price guide shown is a per person from price and is based on low season travel. If tour is booked on its own and not part of the advertised package, a handling fee of $40 per person, per file will apply (price subject to change with exchange rate). Travel must be completed by 31 Mar 26 unless otherwise stated, closeout dates may apply. Minimum/Maximum passenger numbers apply to the tours. Tours and sightseeing are subject to change and additional transfers may be required to connect with tours – these will be an additional cost, please ask your House of Travel consultant.
